entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
